info:identity.info:name: com.ibm.streamsx.eventstore
info:identity.info:description:
The Eventstore toolkit is an open source IBM Streams toolkit that provides adapters for the [https://www.ibm.com/products/db2-event-store|Db2 Event Store] database.
IBM Db2 Event Store is an in-memory database designed to rapidly ingest and analyze streamed data in event-driven applications. It provides the fabric for fast data with its ability to process massive volume of events in real-time, coupled with optimization for streamed data performance for advanced analytics and actionable insights.
**It provides the operators** * `EventStoreSink` to insert tuple data
**The EventStoreSink operator supports the following features** * Streams application configuration * Consistent region support to achieve at-least-once semantic where appropriate * SSL connection * Nullable column with optional type support
+ What's new
